, and is mainly known for the ferries to Puttgarden in Germany, one of the heaviest trafficed ferry routes in Europe, with large ferries departurting every 30 minutes nearly round the clock.

in Germany. If you land in the middle of hiatus, you can take bus 23 to

value: price=Car incl. 5 passengers: 480 DKK, adults 48 DKK
content=Nearly every 30 minutes around the clock, the trip takes 45 minutes and there are restaurant, cafeterias and shops available on board.
content=Sandwiches and other café fare, and ice creams for waiting out the ferry
price=Doubles from 675 DKK incl breakfast buffet

directions=from south when exiting Rødby Ferry port, hold to the right and enter exit-road just before the Statiol gas station; from north take exit 50 and turn left. After 300 meters turn right and you will se the hotel
price=Singles from 299 DKK if booked 60 days in advance

content=Newly refurbished rooms in a friendly Scandinavian design, all rooms have own bathroom, TV and free internet access.  Check-in is possible 24 hours a day through the self-service check-in system. If you have booked bring booking-number and credit card in order to get a keycard. If pre-paid no charges on credit card will be made.  A nice Danish breakfast table can be bought for a small fee.
